93
94/**************************** nfdrs4.h ***********************************
95
96First Letter of Variable or Function Name:
97
98Variable Names Used in Function Calls:
99
100 iAdjust <desired +/- addition to 1-hour fuel moisture>
101 iAspect 1=N, 2=E, 3=S, 4=W
102 iBI Burning Index
103 fDEPTH Fuel Model's depth
104 iDoHerbXfer 1=Transfer (appropriate amt of) Herb Load to 1Hr, 0=No
105 fERC Energy Release Component
106 iExposure 1=Exposed, 0=Not
107 iFIL Fire Intensity Level
108 fFL Flame Length
109 iFM ASCII Value of Fuel Model ID: 65=A, 66=B, ...
110 iHD Fuel Model's Dead (& Live) Heat of Combustion
111 iHour 1, 2, ... 24
112 iIC Ignition Component
113 iJulian Annualized Julian: 1=Jan1,... , 365=Dec31
114 iLat Nearest Degree of Latitude
115 iMaxRH 24-Hour Max RH (-999 means missing)
116 iMaxTemp 24-Hour Max Temp (F) (-999 means missing)
117 fMCn Fuel Moistures for fuel class "n"
118 iMinRH 24-Hour Min RH (-999 means missing)
119 iMinTemp 24-Hour Min Temp (F) (-999 means missing)
120 iMonth 1=Jan, ... 12=Dec
121 iMXD Fuel Model's Moisture of Extinction (%)
122 iNFMAS 1=Use NFMAS Variations, 0=No (Use standard)
123 iRH Observed RH
124 fROS Rate of Spread
125 iSAn Fuel Model's Surface/Area for fuel class "n"
126 iSC Spread Component
127 iSCM Fuel Model's Spread At Which All Ignitiona -> Reportable
128 iSite 1=Low, 2=Mid, 3=Upper
129 iSlope30 1=30% or less, 2=greater than 30%
130 iSlopeCls NFDRS Slope Class (1-5)
131 iSOW State of Weather (0=Clear, ...) (-1 allowed in iCalcIC)
132 iTemp Observed Temp (F) (Can be fuel temp in iCalcIC)
133 fWn Fuel Model's Loading for fuel class "n"
134 fWNDFC Fuel Model's (or desired) Wind Reduction Factor
135 iWS 20-Foot Windspeed
136
137
138Functions:
139
140 Keywords in function names:
141
142 Calc Performs a calculation, returns value(s)
143 Do Performs an action
144 Get Returns values
145 Set Sets values
146
147 Some functions return calculated values. Most, especially integer
148 typed functions, return "success status": 1=Success, 0=Failure.
149
150 Most requested values are returned as function arguments.
151
152
153***************************************************************************/
154
